summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.49.033, 23.49.048, 23.49.052, 23.49.068, 23.49.072, 23.49.098, 23.49.102, 23.49.128, and 23.84.025 of the Seattle Municipal Code in order to permit transfer of development rights from major performing arts facilities in certain downtown zones; to permit the purchase of TDRs for resale; and to make technical corrections.
